changeSet.sql: CREATE OR REPLACE VIEW summary_view AS SELECT c.id, c.name, 'COMPONENT'::text AS element_type FROM components c UNION SELECT s.id, s.name, 'SQUAD'::text AS element_type FROM squads s UNION SELECT d.id, d.name, 'DEPARTMENT'::text AS element_type FROM departments d UNION SELECT m.id, m.name, 'METRIC'::text AS element_type FROM metrics m;
